snippet.title: OUTDATED - Chasmal Fear - Bodycam Survival Horror Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2597570/Chasmal_Fear

Next-gen FPS action horror game built in Unreal Engine 5 from the perspective of a body camera. Manage limited resources, make smart choices which affect your playthrough and survive monsters that mutate to get stronger. Played as singleplayer or Co-Op with 2 players.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2597570/Chasmal_Fear

Socials:
Twitter: twitter.com/MystiveDev
Tiktok: tiktok.com/@mystivedev 
Instagram: instagram.com/mystivedev
Facebook: facebook.com/MystiveDev

#survivalhorrorgaming #survivalgame #horrorgaming
